comment: This file contains attribution and license information for non-script files
in the data directory. The rest of the files are licensed under the same
license as the source code of the game (GNU LGPL 3.0 or newer).
Originals generally aren't included to the package. This mainly applies
to Blender models and PNG originals of DDS files. Such files start with
'import/' and can be downloaded from the Lips of Suna data repository.

assets.comment: Reduced the polygon count of the original.
Too plain; the head and fletchings don't look quite good. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arrow for possible ideas.
Manually retopologized and fitted to the original texture. Applied contrast stretching to the texture. Baked normals from the high polygon model.
This is a special texture used by the fur shader.
Minor modifications were done to fit the mesh with our rigs. The texture was desaturated to make it compatible with our hair coloring system. The normal map was generated from hair2.png
The icons are scaled down from 34x34.
Projected from the original and modified with texture paint.
Texture baked from the procedural textures.
Textures baked from the original model.
Textures baked from the procedural textures.
